means: 残积层，因风吹积的细砂土

sentence.Network_en: The Quaternary thick eluvium and slide rock are dispersed over the Yangshan Au ore belt.
sentence.Network_cn: 阳山金矿区第四系残坡积物分布面积较广,厚度较大.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 地质专业英语词汇(E-F) ... eluviation 淋滤酌 eluvium 残积层 elytron 翅鞘.
水利工程专业英语 - 河林的日志 - 网易博客 ... deluvium， 坡积物（层） eluvium， 残积物（层） eolian deposit， 风积物（层）.

encyclopedia.content: Matthew Cooper(Eluvium)是一位Experimental Ambient音乐家，其音乐带着Minimal锛埣蛟贾饕屣級的意念及手法。Minimal音乐强调以重复的段落，利用音乐中的微细变动，呈现出音乐的层次感，令听者置身于意识流之中；这种表达方式近似于Post-Rock，而Eluvium的音乐就经常被拿来跟冰岛后摇滚乐队Sigur Ros比较，但显而易见的是，Minimal派系的电子音乐不如Post-Rock般，不会出现乐器暴发的摇滚张力，亦因而显得更游离虚幻。

auth_sentence.content: Eluvium is currently signed to record label Temporary Residence Limited.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eluvium is currently signed to record label Temporary Residence Limited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eluvium is currently signed to record label Temporary Residence Limited.

auth_sentence.content: Eluvium is the moniker of ambient recording artist Matthew Cooper, who currently resides in Portland, Oregon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eluvium is the moniker of ambient recording artist Matthew Cooper, who currently resides in Portland, Oregon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eluvium is the moniker of ambient recording artist Matthew Cooper, who currently resides in Portland, Oregon.

auth_sentence.content: C. will begin with two opening performances, one by Eluvium and the other by The Paper Chase.
